data.name: Fastidious
data.detailed_description:
Shot them coppers and chase the dough!


Features:


Heists - Detailed and realistic heists where you are not forced to play it a certain way, at all. If you have a deathwish, then go ahead and rush through the doors and start blasting up a bank!

Outposts - Your Outpost is where you keep your loot and money! Go around and furnish it just how you like it. Don’t forget to upgrade your security levels and storage capacity to ensure max profit.

Multiplayer Coop - Play with 5 of your friends in Fastidious! Keep in mind that everyone doesn’t have to get their hands dirty. Some of your team may stay outside the heist as a remote commander where they have access to blueprints over the building and can access the police radios etc.!

Freeplay - You’re not forced to do anything or do it in a certain way, instead it’s up to you how you roll.

Mod Support - Coming Soon

data.short_description: Play with 5 of your friends in Fastidious! Keep in mind that everyone doesn’t have to get their hands dirty, so while they sit outside you can go in and shoot up the place!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: AMD FX-6100/Intel i3-3220 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7750, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 1700/Intel i7-6700K or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX Vega 56, Nvidia GTX 1070/GTX1660Ti or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 24 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X 10.9 and higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: We are researching on this Platform
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X 10.9 and higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 24 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: We are researching on this Platform
